title: Hour 1: Appealing to Who?
description:
Dominique Foxworth, Jordan Cornette and Chris Canty all join the show to reacts to the NFL appointing Pete C. Harvey to hear the appeal of Deshaun Watson's suspension. The crew also discuss their confidence in the Rams after troubling injury news about their star QB Matthew Stafford broke. The crew then debates who will win the AFC West, and if Josh Allen will establish himself as the best QB in the NFL.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
